requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz DualCore CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000 with OpenGL 2.0 support
